actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

official_title: To amend title 23, United States Code, relating to the determination of the minimum amount of Federal-aid highway funds to be allocated to a State in a fiscal year.

summary.text: Provides that the minimum allocation amount for each State's share of Federal-aid highway funds shall not apply to Interstate System discretionary projects, emergency relief, and highway bridge replacement and rehabilitation discretionary projects.

titles.title: To amend title 23, United States Code, relating to the determination of the minimum amount of Federal-aid highway funds to be allocated to a State in a fiscal year.
